casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF: S.C.H. and J.A.H., Jr. No. 84P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2017 Michael E. Casterline, Attorney at Law, Asheville, for Hampton, James Andrew (Sr.). Brooke L. Clark, Attorney at Law, for Robeson County DSS. Jami J. Farris, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for GAL. Anthony D. Griffin, Attorney at Law, Red Springs, for Williams, Trellis.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 13th of March 2017 by Respondent (Father) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of May 2017."
